vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.12;
son of: Amzi (H0557H);
father of: Jeroham (H3395J)
§ Pelaliah = "Jehovah has judged"
son of Amzi and ancestor of Adaiah the priest in the time of Nehemiah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Amsí; ancestro de Adaías, sacerdote, post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗拉利 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已審判"
暗洗的兒子, 尼希米時代的大祭司亞大雅的祖先 #尼 11:12|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
毗拉利 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已审判"
暗洗的儿子, 尼希米时代的大祭司亚大雅的祖先 #尼 11:12|
